channel.title: Farms on Farms Finder

item.title: Briggs Trees
item.description: Briggs Trees is a family-owned and operated Christmas tree farm that has been serving the Ottawa area for 35 years. Spanning 100 acres of woods, the farm offers a variety of tree species including spruce, balsam, and Scotch pine for customers to cut their own. Visitors can enjoy a peaceful walk through the scenic property and select the perfect natural tree for their holiday celebrations. In addition to the cut-your-own experience, the farm also provides natural Christmas wreaths for purchase. With its long history and commitment to providing a high-quality, authentic Christmas tree experience, Briggs Trees is a beloved destination for families in the region.
